title: Premium Member Reception: Van Gogh and the Avant-Garde
title_display: Premium Member Reception: Van Gogh and the Avant-Garde
hero_caption: Vincent van Gogh. River Bank in Springtime, May–July 1887. Dallas Museum of Art, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Eugene McDermott in memory of Arthur Berger.
short_description: Enjoy refreshments, afternoon bites, and an exclusive talk by author and curator Giovanni Aloi on Van Gogh and the Avant-Garde: The Modern Landscape.
list_description: Enjoy refreshments, afternoon bites, and an exclusive talk by author and curator Giovanni Aloi on Van Gogh and the Avant-Garde: The Modern Landscape.
description:
As a premium member at the Art Institute of Chicago, you are invited to celebrate Van Gogh and the Avant-Garde: The Modern Landscape with a special reception on Saturday, June 10. Enjoy refreshments, light bites, and an exclusive talk by author and curator Giovanni Aloi. Arrive early or join us after the talk to see the groundbreaking show, which features innovative works by Vincent van Gogh and his Post-Impressionist contemporaries.

To register by phone, please contact Member Engagement at (312) 499-4111.
Registration required by Monday, June 5.

Program Schedule

2:00–3:30
Reception begins in the Chicago Stock Exchange Trading Room

3:30–5:00
Exhibition viewing in Regenstein Hall

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu or call (312) 499-4111 as far in advance as possible.
